lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a big groove left behind her as she's being dragged through it. You get to the second trap that she marked, and you guys make your way around it. You make your way to where the road diverges, the one way to the castle, and the one to the acid pits. And Cassandra heads towards the acid pits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cassandra, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's throwing them in the acid pits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She doesn't look back at you. She just keeps walking. You follow her for about five minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we sure this won't make anything bad happen if we throw a body into the acid pits?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After about five minutes of following her, the path leads up and then crests, and there is a room that smells awful. It's similar to the acrid scent the room was filled with when the acid was pouring into the room. There's a whole series of other chemicals and inside, you can see there's a number of laboratory set-ups near you. You get the feeling this is probably where a lot of this particular acidic concoction that was fine-tuned for this stone of Whitestone was created, or at least, honed by Ripley. Without a beat, Cassandra walks up to the edge and just throws Delilah's body in. (plop, sizzle) Then it disappears beneath the surface as the hissing, bubbling noise takes over the silence of the room. She sits there and just watches it sink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't feel too bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra turns back around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She was too dangerous to let live.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about you? How do you feel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's that gun barrel of yours?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out the broken barrel and inspect it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had some thoughts but yeah. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Just looking at it, it looks like the names are there, emblazoned as to where they were before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to just take the broken gun and point it at my sister. What do I feel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm all right. I think I may be all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you toss that thing into the acid just in case?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do something else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to shoot your sister like you just pointed your gun at her? What was that about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were the one who wouldn't give me the other gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I gave you the other gun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go over to the little lab setup. Is there some acid there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Yeah, a brief look around you can see there are many different compounds, different strengths of acid, what a lot of the initial experimentation was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start trying to scar her name off the barrel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take a moment and eventually manage to scar and dissolve enough of the exterior of that barrel until the name is no longer visible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (scoffs) You think it's fine?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to have to have some faith.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have any faith! Here, we'll make a deal. I'll let you keep that gun if you give me the other one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So glad that your smoke monster is seemingly gone, Percy. That's wonderful news. The spinning orb of death, however, is still back there, so we should probably figure out what to do about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I think perhaps we can talk to Keeper Yennen. Perhaps put together some priests to deal with that. Enlist the help of the entire town now that there's no longer a revolution to be fought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's a solid plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the revolution.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We forgot about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should go stop the fighting. Right? We should probably let them know it's over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well if they're fighting, wouldn't it mean it's not over?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm sure they don't know that the Briarwoods are dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So perhaps if we tell everyone the Briarwoods are dead. Cassandra?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we'll see Ripley on the way out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wouldn't that be nice?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just had a thought, Percy. I cast Friends on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I know how to fix your gun, if you hand it to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never in my right mind would I hand my gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have an advantage on it. No, he has advantage on the persuasion, you do not have it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're talking, can I attempt to pull it off of his belt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pull it off of Percy's?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My insight is 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are going to cost me so much money.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see Scanlan kill it, and I just step back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You look down at this gnome, and while he's normally pretty silly and jovial, in this moment, there's an honest spark of his own inspiration in his eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whimpers) I'm so upset that I have to do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wink!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to kill you. I'm going to kill you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know. He's your friend. You're not mad at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For another three minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, roleplay for three minutes, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand him the broken gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Begrudgingly, you reach out and place it in his hand and release.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I say, thank you, Percy. I think, in due time, you

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to hop on my shoulders?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I go run and jump on Grog's shoulders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you watch it arc forward, in your head, you're like, "That fucking gnome." The spell fades, you hear him say that, and just as it (plop, sizzle).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not going to get that, are you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I reach in to try and grab it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Percy! And I reach out and I grab his hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He threw it! You threw it, though, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he dropped it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He lobbed it. It wasn't a huge throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Hold Person at 3rd level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I reach up and I grab his hands as well!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was so expensive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heroes' Feast, workin' against you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the lord of Castle Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My difficulty class? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like, "That cost a-- (cracking)"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) I always fail rolls against Percy! It sucks!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments pass. You don't even see it beneath the surface now. You just see a little bit of some fume released from whatever slow process is dissolving your gun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I step in front as he's unconscious and I go, Percy, dear. You'll thank us for this later, I know it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's paying for a new one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I kiss his cheek and say, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's paying for a new one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll get you a new one, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to have to-- oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're watching this, from the fume, a small plume of black smoke goes (whoosh).

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: See?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It feels good, doesn't it?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doesn't it feel good?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fucking genius!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It feels good! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was so expensive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, come on!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, just throw the carpet in there now, why don't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Percival, that hurts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra steps up to you and takes your head in her hands and forces you to look at her and goes, "Brother. We've all made sacrifices for this." She slaps you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (yelps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! That's a 21. 19 plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's held right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still holding him in place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hold my fist way up high to Scanlan on Grog's shoulder for a silent little exploding fist bump.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she looks to you and goes-- Cassandra gives you a look to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were never Mother's favorite.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's not be petty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She told me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's not be petty, Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You sure you want to let him go? You sure? Did you hear what he just said to you? You sure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It came out as (muffled angry sounds).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I let it go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, your muscle control comes back to you and Cassandra is holding your freshly slapped face, gives you a look and goes, "Brother. Let's go to our people. Let's tell them that for the first time in "five years Whitestone is free."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god. Yeah. I'm letting it go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches over and she takes your arm in her arm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes your arm in her arm and begins walking both of you back towards the tunnels.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That one was enchanted. Okay. Two enchantments. Yeah, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, we're going to go ahead and take a quick bathroom break. Meet you guys back here in a few minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're still alive!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not alive!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not controlled anymore! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, folks! So. Let's go ahead and pick up where we left off. So, as you guys return to the undercroft of Whitestone, Cassandra carrying you, arm in arm. You make your way up through the stairs to the main base floor of Castle Whitestone. Are you guys heading towards your-- where are you heading from here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to head straight for the front door and look in-- is there a balcony on top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can check for the second floor if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Overviews the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a pretty high view. It's already elevated on this platform, so even from a ground-floor area you can look down into the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Front door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have been traveling underground for quite some time and taken a few short rests, and have had a lot of conflict and things happen. So you started at the start of the day. You're now pushing into towards dusk. But as you open up and look outside, with what daylight is still there, you see little plumes of smoke coming from the far city. Down the pathway that leads up to Castle Whitestone, you see about 70 to 100 armored humanoids marching up towards the front of the castle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Humanoids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bipedal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I pick up my caltrops?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to pick up your caltrops.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know what this is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, they're good guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it could be an undead army.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know what this is. Do I need roll perception if I know what it is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow! 19 minus...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys get your weapons at the ready--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25, sorry. Did the math wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they get closer, they meet your gaze, and the front of the group draw their weapons, and Yennen steps forwards a little bit. "You there! Percival."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I step forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vox Machina. Are your wits about you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Briarwoods are dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Serpent's head has been cut off, but there is much to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it still cloudy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little cloudy. It's not rainstorm ready, but there's still sort of an overcast feel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and at third level, because that's all I got left, cast Skywrite again, and throw up the de Rolo crest once again in the sky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you begin to coalesce the clouds and the symbol and the shapes, you see a bunch of the soldiers look around and Yennen steps forward again towards you and goes, reaching up holding his holy symbol of Erathis to his chest, he goes, "Are you certain this is done? Percival."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's still a great evil beneath the castle, but the Briarwoods are no more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's much to discuss. Let us step from this foul place for the time being. Men! Walk through, "make sure it's clean." And the some of the soldiers--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's still a matter of some things beneath the castle that we must deal with first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one should be allowed in for right now, until we figure this out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Men, seal the doors, seal the entrances. Keep watch."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We really need to rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then come. You've certainly earned it." And he motions to a few of the guards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time of day is it? Do we have a sense? Is the sun still up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sun's still up, but you can see from the light source and the darkening of the sky and the color pushing from a general white-grey. It's going a little more reddish-orange.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we take a rest, I'm going to look at Percy, and I'm going to be like, I'll catch up with you guys. I think the people need to see the sun. And I'm going to go into my air elemental form, go up into the sky above Whitestone, and do my Whirlwind ability and start trying to just push all of the clouds out of the way to let the sun in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you guys begin--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, did she freeze?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's frozen in a beautifully surprised expression.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can still hear us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she can still hear us but she's frozen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Surprise!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to march down towards the city with the rest of the army. A group of about ten men stay behind just to guard the castle. As you make you way to the northern side of Whitestone and you enter the streets again, you can see families beginning to walk out of their homes in the streets. In the entirety of your time here in Whitestone, most folks that didn't need to be out in the open stayed indoors, and you begin to realize this seeming ghost city was hiding a lot more life and a lot more hope than you had expected, and you see families, and children, stepping out, and as you walk through the streets you can see the kids wave. You meet eyes with some of the possible widows, who mouth to you, "Thank you".

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seeing that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we pass by the Alcove?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seeing that, I'm going to do the buddy arm around the shoulder and pull my sister in close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat) I walk up to a particularly handsome widow, and I say, your husband--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike is right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike is shocked. Pike is shocked and offended.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you looking at me like that, Pike? Pike, stop it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk away, she looks really confused and clutches her chest in horror for a moment as one of the soldiers walking with you steps by her side, looking at you curiously, and gives her a kiss on the cheek. She goes, "Who was that man?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we-- definitely want to go, let's stop by the Alcove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You eventually start making your way towards the Alcove as you enter deeper into the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike, you there? Can you hear us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have I cleared up enough of the sky at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to get to that right now, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to get to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are stepping-- I'm sorry, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Alcove's to your left, if you wish to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to stop in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you start heading towards the Alcove you can see Jordana is already out on the front stoop looking up at the sky. She looks over and sees you. "Percival!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give her a big hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes her by surprise at the moment, and then she gives in and continues to give the hug back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This would not have been possible without your help. Thank you for everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course." She leans into the hug a little bit, then nods and then raises her head. "Did you "see my father?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have not. We have not searched the castle yet, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just left it? We haven't searched the castle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We searched a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there could be live people in there when we sealed it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know. It's not airtight or anything. I mean, they're breathing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ripley's gone and also there's a goliath on the loose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say this, Keeper Yennen goes, "Not anymore, there isn't. Follow me."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any young boys around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stops in his tracks and looks over his shoulder and goes, "What?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just need a young, fleet-footed boy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: See, the last time I asked for a young boy people gave me shit, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no problem here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He slowly turns away and keeps walking forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or a girl! No, wait, that sounds weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. You can't say it in a right way. It's impossible. Innocent request.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The people have begun following behind your procession towards the center of the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's fucked up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's going to explode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Show us what you want to show us, Yennen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let us all take a moment and thank the heroes who made this freedom possible: to the strong mountain "of joy and bravery, Grog. To the gentle, to the kind, to the just soul, Pike. To the swift of bow, "keen of sight, and the most adorable creature to accompany her--" as Trinket steps forward and nuzzles your side-- "Trinket. By the agility, by the cunning, by the loyalty of Vax. By the "cleverness, by the wit, and the strange interests of Scanlan. By the honesty, by the nature and "connection with the world, and the wonder of Keyleth. And by the strength of blood, and the "willingness to sacrifice-- "

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (mic bump)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Start that one again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's still very beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So beautiful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival's just waiting for his introduction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To the stone-cold motherfucker on air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hyah!" And everyone raises as one loud--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Vox Machina!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the sun slowly sets, the light coming through in beautiful colors now. You see what was once a very bleak town suddenly be renewed with a spectrum of new accents. You begin to hear music being played, as now the celebration begins with the sun's setting. Folks are turning this into a full celebration now. People are starting to bring out food and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Block party!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yennen says, "The two remaining new nobles, given power here as they aided the Briarwoods in taking "this city. We have Duke--" which the people spit at the sound of the name-- "Goran Vedmeyer. And "Countess Jazna Graben. You have been found guilty of treason against this town, of the "responsibility of many lives lost, innocent. And for furthering the plans of the evil that has "oppressed us so long. I would wish that you, the ones who freed us, deliver the judgment."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that sounds fair. I've known to preside over many legal matters in my time as Judgeface of Northwind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Define "legal."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Define "Judgeface."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It would just baffle all of you. It's all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, if I may. I can assist you in this, if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, why of course, Sub-judge Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Grog. Percival, this is your kingdom, so if you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I leave it to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Even better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These two have done much violence to this place. They represent all that is evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait." And Goran, who is now down on the ground, looks up at you and goes, "I know you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never saw you before, friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what I really wanted to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spits on the ground at your feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might need a new roofer. Anyway. In a show of grace and to demonstrate our new hope that we have for this place, I suggest that we don't kill these two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But rather force them to help rebuild the place that they helped destroy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In chains. Very heavy chains.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of them at least is extremely strong. The other one must have some sort of skill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She for the first time looks up with this gnarly toothy grin. You can see these partially broken and jagged teeth in her mouth, and she goes, "Come closer. I've never tasted gnome."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so maybe we'll kill her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you rather die?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of weapons did these two have on them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The men look about themselves and Yennen, "Not entirely certain. However, she has been known "to carry a quiver or two, and this one here wields a blade as long as his body."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Briarwoods are broken and gone. You can die today, or you can take your licks and help rebuild this city. No one is here to protect you or save you. You can work hard, start again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check. With advantage, based on their current circumstance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Intimidation, you said, or persuasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whichever you'd prefer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's average, it's 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Okay. You can see the goliath, Vedmeyer, lowers his head. "I accept. Jazna?" She looks over. "It seems you lack what has kept me alive all these years: a spine. Kill me. I'd "rather not stay at your beck and call."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach over and I take out my greataxe and I aim it for her neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as, did you swing or just aim it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beheading-style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Merry Christmas, Travis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull the axe out and you walk alongside with it almost like a cane, look down at her--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, like a cane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cloven, if you will, sorry. There's a moment of pause before the blood begins to pour from the wound, it was so fast and so immediate, and the body just slumps forward. There's a gasp in the crowd suddenly, and then a cheer as the locals now see one of the people that probably oppressed, tortured, and killed many of their folk now lies on the ground, killed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look at the axe and look at the blood covering it and I look over at Duke Gonad and I say, so, where are you from and how did you come to be in the service of the Briarwoods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was hired in Wildmount."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I know where that is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've heard it mentioned, but you have no idea where it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, the holy lands of the sacred-- all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay, your honor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you like to take it from here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While we always must dispense our justice, this is now a town of mercy as well. And I will expect nothing less from all of us than to give what we have lacked for so long. Duke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let hers be the last blood shed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Earn your life again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He nods and looks down. You can't tell if it's shame or just defeat, but his shoulders slump and that little bit of fire that was in him when he arrived is broken. The men look at you, they get your nod and they lift the chains and pull them off while a couple of the men pick up the body of the half-orc woman and pull them out of the crowd. The music swells up once again, and the celebration continues without a beat. You can now see tables being brought out to the center and glasses are set about and drinks are being poured as a giant central table right at the base of the Sun Tree is set for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They've just had this shit in a Tupperware container, like in those big bins in the back for the last five years with like duct-tape lids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a grand meal, there hasn't been a lot of time to prepare for it, but basically what it looks like is whoever is preparing dinner or whatever food was readily available, they're just bringing it out. It's more of like a share-with-whoever's-there type effort.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, it's a potluck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I find a young boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or a soldier, and I give him 15 gold and I say, for the love of god, find me a fucking beret.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, sir." And the boy takes the gold and rushes off, looking in his hands at the boon he's been given by this practically-same-height man. They don't see gnomes here very often; it's been very confusing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to take some time to tell Keeper Yennen about what is beneath the tree and let him start to macerate some theories on what to do--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Macerate? That's a big word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After you finish this conversation, he sits there and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a word for big name. Thank you. Do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments pass before the boy returns, in his hand a (singing) raspberry beret, the kind you find in a secondhand store.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, feels good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make it look cooler on him, because he made it look dorky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a beret. I don't think he made it dorky. I think it comes with that already sewn in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There it is, looks good. It looks good, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was your name, young boy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make it good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Randall?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Randall. You've made me a very happy small man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he brings you the change.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a beret.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he darts off excitedly. You catch him out of the corner of your eye like stealing a swig of beer--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Brandon Gilmore, that was his young name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brandon Gilmore?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Brandon. So after you finish regaling this tale to Keeper Yennen, let's see if I have a proper song for celebration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm doing my best to empty the cask of ale into the town patrons and myself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if that's-- less aviary than celebratory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can Keyleth go over and check out the Sun Tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, as you're walking over there, we'll finish this conversation here. Yennen nods to himself and goes, "That is disconcerting. I'll reach out to a few of my contacts, see who we can "bring here to inspect it. I may go down tomorrow myself and have a look. Is it safe?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's also disturbing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unfortunately, I'm rather limited in my teachings."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But she's not in town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can send word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please do."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Ryndarien?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eskil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was Eskil Ryndarien, the archmage in Westruun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Either, both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good, good, yes, anyone at all. Maybe I'll be able to glean something, but unfortunately most "of our books were confiscated when the town was taken. However, I appreciate that, and at least "for the time being, there doesn't seem to be any dead rising from the grave."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I may, Percy, may I make a suggestion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it going to be throwing the rest of my guns into a pit of acid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but it will be spending some of your kingdom's money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Replacing the guns that you threw into a pit of acid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's not talk about the guns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really can't think of what else I'd want to talk about. Please, go ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If most of their books have been taken from them, perhaps we could use some of the treasury to build a library.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is not a terrible idea, and it's possible that the books are still within the castle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's possible that the Briarwoods have hoarded all of them. In fact, we might find something about this entity inside the castle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we do need to build three new structures where the lords' houses were, and I find the idea of rebuilding those mansions to be a bit distasteful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perhaps we could even name one of the libraries Gilmore's Glorious Books.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Set up a satellite chain?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will discuss it. It's got a ring, I will admit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys are having this conversation--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I was just going to add to that, I'm sure the man can help in this city's time of need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You were doing something, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sky's growing more purple and dark blue. But now lights have been lit and lanterns have been brought to the center, you can see the Sun Tree in full before you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach up and I put my hand on it and I cast Commune With Nature. Do I gather anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does Commune With Nature do in full?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It lets you commune with nature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Essentially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a DM version of natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is. Except he does it all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so which do you want to know, of all the things that you can choose from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what are my choices?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can choose from terrain or bodies of water in the vicinity; prevalent plants, minerals, animals, or peoples; powerful celestials, fey, fiends, or elementals or undead within 300 feet of it-- or sorry, within three miles of it; influence from other planes of existence; or buildings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The influence of other planes of existence sounds promising.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you gain three facts. So, first off, you notice as you touch the Sun Tree and you cast the spell, whereas previously you felt just dead wood and a lack of any presence, there is a small seed of life in the tree once again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you inquire about any other planes of existence, you do sense that at least some element nearby relates to a realm of shadow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's obvious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what's the third one you want to know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I get a choice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't know I had a choice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have to ask anything else if you don't want to, if you got everything you wanted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it going to be a good growing season this spring? Crops going to be good? It's going to be a good harvest moon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask how it's feeling, can you ask how it's feeling?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How's it feeling? Can I ask the tree how it's feeling, can I be like, "Hey tree. How are "you doing today?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is very Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You doing all right? How do you feel between all this, about all this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, boo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, boo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense weariness, like something very old that has been asleep for a very long time has woken up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it feel positive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Positive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Sun Tree, seemingly kept at bay, locked away, what bit of its life force it managed to maintain had been contained for so long and is now finally free.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I just say, good morning, old friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense the tree saying, "The sun just set. It's not morning."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, oh shit. And then I turn to Percy and I say, the tree talked to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In that ancient way that trees talk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just had a smoke monster you were talking to, is it that hard to believe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Ent voice) It's... not... morning...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I watched her walk up to the tree and I followed her--

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go. I follow her up and I don't say anything, but I see one hand on the tree and without saying anything--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk up behind Vax and I pants him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I grab the back of his collar and pull backwards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the revenge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you going to roll anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not sure what he did though. Pantsing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grabbed your pants and I pulled them down to your ankles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But what's the part about the collar?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I grabbed the back of your neck and pulled you backwards with your pants around your ankles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. He's got to roll, but if it happens, it happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. I would consider this a grapple check. So it's your athletics versus your acrobatics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the pantsing? Is that included?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is the pantsing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20, plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, natural 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, 19 plus-- 26. My athletics is plus seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 32.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach out and are about to grasp the sides, he leaps straight up in the air and then lands a foot in front of you. You grab nothing and see him glance over his shoulder and tsk-tsk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I knew that was going to happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll just be worse later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice try, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You already took my left nut off my body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, please. That was but appetizers for the main course, my friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so that's challenge number one, now challenge number two. So, I still don't say anything besides (inhale) as I jump to the side really fast to not loose my breeches. And she's got one hand on the tree, and I just quietly, with her free hand and my free hand, try to lace my fingers with hers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against the tree?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, you guys are boyfriend and girlfriend now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you finish your awkward it's-not-morning conversation with the essence of the Sun Tree--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's morning somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I'm talking, good morning, Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel a strange alien hand in your left free hand for a moment, unexpectedly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I jump and I yank away instinctually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, she pulls away from it and looks over her shoulder with a bit of surprise and sudden horror.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shrug and look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just talking to the tree. It talked back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (long pause)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggling) Everyone is hiding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm giving them privacy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get privacy. It's your moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So? Vax just stands there, not saying anything, just looking at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I already said it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't look at them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I don't know. I'm really confused.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax says, all right. And walks off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. I'd be lying if I said often at night when I go to sleep, your face isn't the last thing that crosses my mind. But with the weight of the world and the weight of the contact-embarrassment from our fellow party, currently, it's hard to focus on. (hesitantly) You said that when you were near death. We say a lot of things when we're near death. How do I know that's what you were truly feeling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't say it out loud, I just thought it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you told her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, that wasn't in your head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wore a mask for a long time, where I grew up. And I'm not going to do that anymore. I'll wait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I don't know what else to say right now. I'm really tired. Really tired. I think there's also a part of me that's just afraid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like I'm going to get pantsed by a goliath at any moment. Don't do anything. Don't change anything. I haven't lied. I've told the truth. If you'll have me, I'm yours. If you don't want me, I understand. And that's all there is to say. And then I actually walk off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stay by the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As this is happening and he walks off, you guys are there at the table, just now noticing the both of them have been missing. You see Keyleth, stunned, standing by the Sun Tree as Keeper Yennen approaches you once again and goes, "My friends. We have a lot of work to do and it "would not be fair for me to assume, as you've already done so much for us, but it has been a "while since we've had much to celebrate in this town, and this evening seems a fine "improvisational event. But we have two weeks until the Winter's Crest festival would be happening "here in Whitestone, something we have not celebrated in near five years. I would just ask, "should you be interested, if you would wish to stay with us these next couple of weeks to help us "rebuild and perhaps aid in preparing the first real shining moment in Whitestone's history since "you were gone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would be very grateful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We shall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cassandra nods, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keeper, may I ask for a small request? Could you maybe send a wonderfully worded letter to Uriel and let him know how we saved the day and how much you love us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks very confused. "I imagine that could be-- I assume that could be done, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be wonderful. Make sure you mention how terrible the Briarwoods were and how Vox Machina saved the day. Truly saved it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can write it for you if you just want to sign it at the bottom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That guy's going to wake up this morning and go, "oh, I'm an asshole."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please? Yes, that would be wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. It'll be done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Facepalm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Aw, what was I thinking. Oh."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should've kissed her, it was the perfect moment!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I already did it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No but it was the perfect moment!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't want it to happen anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't care, this is out of character! It would have been the perfect moment!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never said I was smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It makes for fun drama. That was crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How am I going to beat your acrobatics?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are not.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So we gotta get ready for Critmas. So we're going to go offline and back up so we can make sure we get this episode uploaded to you guys on Monday. The longer the video, the longer it takes to transcode and sometimes makes it take longer to get up, so we'll be going offline and then right back up for Critmas, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See you back here in just a few minutes, guys. Don't leave. We'll be here!
